name: Fortis Rex: Rise Of The King.
blurb: Build up your empire and lead a massive war in this army-commanding RPG.

rewards.reward: Your name mentioned in the credits, plus exclusive screenshots(you can use these as a WALLPAPER), and our THANKS!
----------------PRE-ORDER--------------\r\nA digital copy of the FULL VERSION of the game, and YOUR NAME MENTIONED IN THE CREDITS PLUS EXCLUSIVE screenshots AND OUR THANKS!

PRE-ORDER + FREE DLC FOR LIFE\r\nPrevious reward, plus an in-game weapon and suit of armor you can only get HERE ON KICKSTARTER, Bronze Supporter in game credits, Free Downloads of all updates and expansion packs we release for Fortis Rex, PLUS BEHIND THE SCENES FOOTAGE ON THE MAKING OF THE GAME!

PRE-ORDER + BETA + BONUS COPY\r\nPrevious rewards, EARLY BETA ACCESS, a BONUS copy of the game(to use how you want), AND PURE BRONZE SUPPORTER STATUS IN GAME CREDITS, PLUS MORE EXCLUSIVE SCREENSHOTS, PLUS an exclusive in-game weapon you will only find HERE ON KICKSTARTER!

BETA + GIFT COPY + NAME A WEAPON-----------\r\nPrevious rewards,  Extra Bonus Copy of the game, SILVER STATUS IN GAME CREDITS, PLUS you can name a weapon in Fortis Rex, AND THE EXCLUSIVE\r\nSOUNDTRACK FROM FORTIS REX! Only 100 available.

------NAME YOUR OWN TOWN----\r\nPrevious rewards, two more bonus copies, PURE SILVER status in GAME CREDITS, and you can work personally with Justin Nelson to name a WHOLE TOWN + Your name in the credits with your contribution to the game! Only 25 available.

----DESIGN AN NPC + QUEST-----\r\nPREVIOUS REWARDS IN THE 50 DOLLAR TIER, AND GOLD STATUS IN THE GAME CREDITS, PLUS you get to DESIGN YOUR OWN CUSTOM QUEST AND CUSTOM NPC + 2 Bonus Copies + Your name in the credits as a character designer! Only 20 available.

---NAME AND DESIGN A TOWN---\r\nPrevious Rewards in the 50 dollar tier, PLUS the ability to work with Justin Nelson personally to design  and name an ENTIRE TOWN, Your name in the credits as a LEVEL DESIGNER, AND PURE GOLD STATUS IN THE GAME CREDITS + 4 bonus copies of the game! Only 14 available.

-FREE GAMES + FREE DLC FOR LIFE-\r\nPrevious Rewards in the 50 dollar tier, Free downloads of every game we release for life, PLUS free DLC for life as well, and PLATINUM status in game credits + 10 bonus copies of the game! Only 10 available.

----GET YOU FACE IN THE GAME----\r\nPrevious rewards in the 50 dollar tier, plus we will make a model of YOUR HEAD AND FACE and put it in the game AND DIAMOND STATUS IN THE GAME CREDITS + 20 bonus copies!

----BECOME LORD OF A CASTLE---\r\nKING status in the GAME CREDITS, PLUS A MAJOR PLACEMENT IN THE GAME WORLD(ALL PLAYERS WILL INTERACT WITH YOU) PLUS A MAJOR CASTLE(plus servants) AND ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS(DESIGN A TOWN AND EVERYTHING ELSE!) + 50 bonus copies of the game. Only 4 available ----------------NOTE: If we run out of the above rewards, we will add additional gameplay to give you EVERYTHING above. That means you get to design your own weapon, town, have the town named the name you give it, every game and DLC we release FOR LIFE, your name and face in the game, your own castle(complete with servants), and King status in game credits. You will be part of the main quest and ALL players will interact with you!

----EVERYTHING + MAJOR CONTRIBUTOR----\r\nEVERYTHING mentioned above, ALL THE REWARDS, YOUR NAME MENTIONED FIRST IN THE CREDITS AS A MAJOR CONTRIBUTOR(even before the team is listed), PLUS the ability to direct us in the design of 10 OBJECTS OF YOUR CHOICE(anything in the game, weapons, castles, towns, ANYTHING!) You can personally NAME and DESIGN whatever you want for Fortis Rex and we will bring into reality! Ever wanted to design your own custom level or character? You can do it with this package!
